dcterms:creator: Mariza Miola Dosciatti
Lohann Paterno Coutinho Ferreira
Emerson Cabrera Paraiso
dcterms:description: The G1 Corpus is composed of 2,000 titles and headlines of news extracted from the website G1, annotated with six basic emotions and a neutral class. Each news item was labeled by two annotators, allowing for multiple emotions to be assigned.
dcterms:title: G1 Corpus

dcterms:description: The BFRC-PT is a new corpus consisting of 8,080 entertainment news articles written in Brazilian Portuguese, annotated with user reactions based on votes. The corpus includes various emotional reactions such as cute, fail, funny, hate, love, shock, skeptic, and win.
dcterms:title: BFRC-PT (BuzzFeed Reactions Corpus)
